it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net

Class NetInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.NetInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArpInterface, EthInterface, EthTunnelInterface, Ip4EthInterface, Ip4TunInterface, Ip4TuntapInterface, Ip6EthInterface, LinkInterface, LoopbackInterface, LossyIpInterface, PppTunnelInterface, RawEthInterface, TapInterface

    public abstract class NetInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    A network interface for sending and receiving packets.

    It may have one or more interface addresses.
